author: ADAM ENGEL Adam.Engel@MagicValley.com
title: CSI's Asim Jones signs with Florida International
text:
Asim Jones’ first text from Jesse Bopp made the difference.
Initial contact occurred after College of Southern Idaho’s first game.
The interest increased with each game. Other offers piled in but Jones noticed the genuine nature of it all and honored Bopp’s Florida International University squad with a commitment.
CSI standout guard Jones signed his National Letter of Intent on Thursday with the NCAA Division I Panthers.
“It means a lot,” Jones told the Times-News. “I definitely worked really hard to get here. Had a setback last year. Had a good experience to learn from other players. Got a chance this year. I took the role to be one of the best players on the team. Definitely feel good.”
Jones, a 2024 NJCAA Honorable Mention All-American and First Team Region 18 selection, transitioned from a role player to a key starter.
People are also reading…
CSI men’s basketball guard Asim Jones earned NJCAA Division I Honorable Mention All-American honors, announced Tuesday.
Jones, with timely speed and flashy handles, led the Golden Eagles with 17.5 points and 4.3 assists per game.
The Golden Eagles finished as Region 18 runners-up.
“It is a good place for him,” CSI head coach Jeff Reinert said. “He likes that. We want all of our players to sign.”
Jones joined Kasen Carpenter (NAIA Carroll College) as CSI’s signees so far from the 2023-24 team.
Minico alumnus Kasen Carpenter is trying to work his way back into the rotation after breaking his right hand earlier this season.
Jones waited his turn as a freshman on a squad who occupied the top national ranking for a chunk of the season and recorded the second undefeated regular season in program history.
He sat behind a roster full of six Division I signees, including First Team All-American guard Isaiah Moses and Honorable Mention All-American forward Rob Whaley Jr, observed their tendencies and applied those to his game as a sophomore.
“Just being a good person,” Jones said. “If I wasn’t good, I wouldn’t be here so it wasn’t the talent. It was just me being a better person… Last year, I had a lot of talks with the coaches. I was childish. Just watching them and growing. I definitely improved.”
Jones, a Paterson, New Jersey, native, chose the Panthers from a top three which included Middle Tennessee State University and Rider University.
FIU, based in Miami, competes in the Conference USA.
“I can’t wait to get on the court out there, for sure,” Jones said. “Finally put on a Florida International jersey so it definitely feels good.”

author: Simon Williams
title: chevron-right
text: MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. (WPDE) — The Myrtle Beach Police Department (MBPD) recognized 21 years without their fellow Officer Joe McGarry Friday with a wreath-laying ceremony. He was shot and killed while trying to speak with a murder suspect on North Kings Highway on December 29, 2002. NEW: [Classic 1969 Camaro stolen from Robeson County home](https://wpde.com/news/local/classic-1969-camaro-stolen-robeson-county-red-springs-home-free-standing-carport-december-28-2023) Assistant Police Chief Marty Brown said he’ll never forget that phone call and because of it, asked everyone to do something they’ve been putting off. “Just take time to do it. Call your parents and have dinner with them. Call up an old friend and shoot the breeze for a little while, somebody you haven’t talked to in a while, just give them a call. I promise you they will remember it,” he said at the ceremony. Top 10 stories of 2023: [Bubbling ocean, senior prank, international incidents & Doyle disappearance](https://wpde.com/news/local/ocean-bubbles-pee-dee-high-school-senior-prank-tyler-doyle-viral-video-tik-tok-f-35b-fighter-jet-crash-atf-gun-laws-mexico-kidnapping-murder-plastic-surgery-chinese-spy-balloon-shot-down-myrtle-beach-whataburger-socastee-swing-bridge-crash-dash-cam) Assistant Chief Brown said he named his son after Officer McGarry and helped design the memorial fountain outside the police department. He invited anyone to view the memorial when visiting the area.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Shropshire river levels expected to peak today after Storm Gerrit battering
text:
Summary by Ground News Flood warning issued for The Quarry and The Showground in Shrewsbury. River levels expected to peak at Welsh Bridge on Friday evening. Comes after county was hit by strong winds and rain from Storm Gerrit. Storm uprooted trees and also appears to have been responsible for a huge 'bang', heard in Bridgnorth. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Shropshire Star Media Conglomerate: MNA Media Shropshire river levels expected to peak today after Storm Gerrit battering Flood defences were put up in Shrewsbury and Ironbridge earlier this week as the Environment Agency prepared for the impact of the swollen River Severn. A flood warning issued for Shrewsbury on Thursday afternoon said that flooding of property, roads and farmland is "expected" and that the river is likely to peak at the Welsh Bridge on Friday evening.
5 hours ago · Ketley, United Kingdom Read Full Article

author: Melanie Macleod
title: Inside the Royal Christmas Album: See the Luxembourg royal family's festive photos
text: Christmas was extra magical for the Luxembourg royal family this year; not only did they have lots of little royals to enjoy the day with, but it was [Princess Alexandra's first festive season as an expectant mother](https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/509721/princess-alexandra-luxembourg-expecting-first-child-nicolas-bagory/). To celebrate the joyful occasion, the family shared a series of charming photos from their private album – spanning the festive season and the whole of 2023, including [Prince François' christening](https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/494635/luxembourg-royal-family-celebrates-prince-franois-christened/) and [Princess Alexandra's wedding](https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/490376/princess-alexandra-luxembourg-striking-wedding-dress-first-photos/) – what a year it has been! Alongside the carousel of photos, the family wrote a heartfelt message, sharing their joy at the year they've had. "2023 was a year full of happiness and emotions for the Grand Ducal Family. (Re)Discover the most beautiful moments in photos. "The Grand Duke and Grand Duchess, and through them, their family, would like to thank you most sincerely for your constant support and your many acts of kindness throughout the year. "They wish you and your loved ones all the best and look forward to seeing you in 2024," they continued, prompting an outpouring of love from their followers. "Beautiful! More exciting times ahead in 2024 to come," one wrote, while another added: "What a year! Absolutely awesome!" Another agreed: "What a beautiful little family, I adore you." Read on to see their heart-warming festive photos and relive the best moments of 2023. SEE MORE: [Luxembourg's Prince Guillaume and Princess Stephanie celebrate baby joy as Prince François is christened](https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/494635/luxembourg-royal-family-celebrates-prince-franois-christened/) READ MORE: [Why Princess Alexandra was once excluded from Luxembourg's line of succession](https://www.hellomagazine.com/royalty/490487/why-princess-alexandra-was-excluded-luxembourg-succession/) LOOK: [Smiling Princess Alexandra of Luxembourg is striking in unexpected bridal jumpsuit](https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/490376/princess-alexandra-luxembourg-striking-wedding-dress-first-photos/) Royally obsessed? Listen to the latest episode of HELLO!'s Right Royal podcast...

author: newsdirectory3
title: Taiwan Plunged into Darkness: Typhoon Kang Rui Leaves 89,000 Households Without Power
text:
2024/11/1 15:13 (Updated at 11/1 16:53)
typhoon brought strong winds and heavy rain and hit Taitung, causing many power outages and severe damage to distribution lines and equipment. Taiwan’s Eastern District Office continued emergency repairs and launched cross-regional assistance early on the 1st. (Provided by Taipower) Fax from Central News Agency reporter Lu Taicheng, Taitung, November 1, 113″ srcset=”https://imgcdn.cna.com.tw/www/WebPhotos/800/20241101/1108x1477_wmkn_450133645456_202411010076 .jpg 414w, https://imgcdn.cna.com.tw/www/WebPhotos/1024/20241101/1108x1477_wmkn_450133645456_202411010076 .jpg 1024w”/>The typhoon brought strong winds and heavy rain and hit Taitung, causing many power outages and severe damage to distribution lines and equipment. Taiwan’s Eastern District Office continued emergency repairs and launched cross-regional assistance early on the 1st. (Provided by Taipower) Fax from Central News Agency reporter Lu Taicheng, Taitung, November 1, 113 (Central News Agency reporter Liu Qianling, Taipei) Typhoon Kangri’s storm circle exited Taiwan early today, according to reports. As of 2:00 p.m. today, 803,000 in Taiwan have been repaired. 89,000 households are without power, including Hualien County and Taitung County, about 40,000. T families are still without electricity and power supply in different areas Will make every effort to recover
The Central Meteorological Administration of the Ministry of Transport and Communications lifted the land typhoon warning for Typhoon Kangri at 11:30 am today and the marine warning is expected to be lifted at 2:30 pm.
Taipower reported that as of 2pm today, 893,162 households in Taiwan have experienced power outages, of which 803,366 households have been repaired and 89,796 households have yet to have power restored, including 21,602 households, 11,980 in Taoyuan City, New Taipei City. households, 5,478 households in Chiayi County, 4,110 families in Taichung City, 3,815 families in Yunlin County, 3,271 families in Taipei City, 1,527 families, 1,039 families in Hsinchu County, 703 families in Miaoli County, 662 families in Kaohsiung City, 572 families in Tainan City, 456 families in Changhua County and There are 12 households in Keelung town.
Taipower said that as the wind and rain subsided in some areas, it immediately mobilized its own and contractor manpower to carry out emergency repairs. However, many urban areas were still severely affected by downed trees. After the disaster, many counties and cities resumed work and classes today will, some roads will be affected by traffic congestion, thereby increasing the difficulty of emergency repairs
In the face of the typhoon disaster, Taipower said it is working closely with local governments to make emergency repairs and gradually restore power supply to various areas.
Taipower reminds users that if there is a power outage, please first determine whether the power outage is only for your own household or for all users in the neighborhood, it is recommended to check whether you have your own switch first. If there is any abnormality, Electrical and Mechanical Co. Contact the staff of Ltd. (Editor: Zhang Junmao) 1131101

author: chemado_chema
title: #58 Fe, familia y odio al progresismo: el poder de los evangélicos latinos se extiende por Estados Unidos
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#4](c4#c-4) Es una manera de verlo. Otra es que unos cuantos españoles se han marchado a países menos corruptos, han visto que se vive mejor así y evitan votar a los partidos que mantienen aquí niveles indecentes de corrupción.
Pero hay de todo…
[#4](c4#c-4) te recomiendo algo más de fibra en tu dieta, parece que aún no has digerido el que no ganaran los tuyos
[#4](c4#c-4) que yo conozca la gente que emigra a EEUU normalmente son gente con títulos superiores donde irse a América es muy buena opción laboral, y ya esta, si votan a la izquierda española sera porque ven desde fuera que es mejor opción.
Que pasa con los que votan a la derecha?
Que significaria?
Por cierto a mayor nivel de estudios el votante de izquierda aumenta, tampoco dices nada de eso?
[#37](c37#c-37) Ay pobres comunistas que el problema que tienen es que son dependientes de importar todo de EEUU.
Pues que sepas que la mayoría del pollo en Cuba viene de Miami, el embargo está hoy en día muy limitado.
Ah, y en la guerra fría había más gente en el bloque comunista que en el bloque capitalista.. y aun así al bloque capitalista le iba mil veces mejor y no necesitaban para nada a los comunistas.
[#1](c1#c-1) No veo relación entre el fanatismo religioso cristiano y los problemas político sociales en latinoamérica.
El Salvador es de los países más evangélicos, junto a Brasil, y las cosas les han empezado a ir bien.
Argentina y Venezuela no son países de corte religioso evangélico y están comiendo mierda.
En Cuba ni religiosos son, y no tienen ni para comer mierda.
[#33](c33#c-33) derecha y diosito van siempre juntitos, si te convenzo que estás en la tierra para sufrir a cambio de una recompensa cuando te mueras, aguantas mejor que te pisen, porque a mayor sufrimiento mayor recompensa
[#33](c33#c-33) Simple, estos tipos se oponen al planamiento familiar.
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4449999/
[#1](c1#c-1) por no hablar de que sus antepasados se arrancarían los pelos de desesperación por ver como han abrazado la religión que los masacró
Y los testigos de Jehová. Antes estaban a la salida de los hospitales con sus plafones. Ahora los veo en: la salida del metro, de los parques y en cualquier esquina o paseo. De 3 en 3. Si no les miras no te molestan, al menos en mi experiencia, pero me parece preocupante cómo van invadiendo el espacio público para su negocio de proselitismo religioso. ¿Puedo plantar un plafón con folletos de mi empresa 7 u 8 horas allá dónde me apetezca y abordar a los transeúntes?
[#3](c3#c-3) al igual que llevan toda la vida ocupando espacio publico los mendigos, los que reparten folletos, los grupos de turistas guiados.... mientras la ocupacion no sea permanente, no hay problema
[#3](c3#c-3) En mi pequeña ciudad de 40k habitantes el otro día me crucé a cuatro así, todos eran latinos. Les dije con palabras poco amables que se fueran con sus historias a su templo, que la calle no era lugar para ello. Eran muy ridículos, hablaban con una grandiosidad típica de pastor evangélico y que si la gloria de dios y mierdas así. Llamé a la policía. Me parece sumamente preocupante esto. Uno de ellos aún venía con ese falso buen rollo a "debatir" conmigo y me hacía preguntas de lo más ridículas. Largo de la calle por favor.
[#21](c21#c-21) y que pasó cuando llamaste a la policía? Que te dijeron los guardias? conseguiste que se fueran?
[#42](c42#c-42) Se fueron a la hora aproximadamente, pero no sé si por su propio pie o por la policía, ya que yo volví donde ellos media hora larga después y ahí seguían. La poli dijo que iba a mandar una patrulla y vi un coche una hora después de llamarles, pero capaz que iban a otro sitio, así que no puedo confirmar. Me olía que estos predicadores eran evangélicos pagados por alguien de aquí o de allá para hacer la ruta, porque el brasileño tenía un acento increíble y hablaba español justo.
[#3](c3#c-3) pero esos, "por fortuna", son tan radicales que no van a ser mayoría nunca y hasta la fecha no se meten en política. Por lo demás, totalmente de acuerdo.
Yo lo llamaría "fe seudocristiana", porque muchas veces esto no está movido por una fe religiosa, sino que la fe religiosa es solo el medio para mover otra cosa, por ejemplo, mantener a la gente distraída odiando el aborto o a los homosexuales mientras no se dan cuenta de que otros se están quedando con la mayor parte de su esfuerzo al trabajar.
Lo peor es que muchos de esos nuevos templos se construyen en base a la necesidad de las gentes que acuden a ellos, aportan "lo que no tienen" y cuatro vividores y sus comparsas se hacen de oro. Para colmo, les adoctrinan con ideología neoliberal envuelta en el evangelio de "san saduceo" , que les promete la "prosperidad", sobre todo la material, demonizando todo sentido crítico que les haga pensar que ese sistema económico es el que les mantiene en la servidumbre y la desigualdad y del que muy pocos saldrán , que siempre son los que les piden el diezmo y lo que haga falta "para el culto", que no es otro que el que zarandea un libro con dorso dorado y una cruz desde el atril...
La religión era prácticamente la única cosa de LATAM que EEUU no controlaba, pero con el evangelismo es probable que en una década o dos reemplace al catolicismo en cantidad de seguidores.
Las personas más insoportables del mundo son los conversos en cualquier modo. Religión, pelo blanco, deporte, vegetariano..., debe ser como ves que tu vida es una mierda y te has equivocado quieres imponer a los demás tu vida de p... Mierda
